component.name: Path of Exile
component.summary: Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in the dark fantasy world of Wraeclast

description.p: Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in the dark fantasy world of Wraeclast. It is designed around a strong online item economy, deep character customisation, competitive PvP and ladder races. The game is completely free and will never be 'pay to win'.
